title: Hillary Rodham Clinton | Will Ferrell | A Closer Look: Democrats Get Their First Big Electoral Wins of the Trump Era
description:
In this episode, Seth takes a closer look at how Trump and his supporters on Fox News are doing everything they can to downplay the Democrats' big wins in New Jersey and Virginia. [ 0:29 ]

Then, Hillary Rodham Clinton visits Late Night on the anniversary of the 2016 election. She discusses her concerns about the Trump administration and why she's optimistic about the future of the Democratic party. [ 9:18 ]

Audience warm-up comedian Ryan Reiss then interviews an audience member about issues facing the country. [ 19:13 ]

Next, Seth interviews Will Ferrell about his new movie Daddy's Home 2, and his favorite rejected SNL sketch that could be resurrected in Second Chance Theatre. [ 20:18 ]

Finally, Will answers a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G with Late Night producer Kevin Miller. [ 29:36 ]

(Photos: Lloyd Bishop/©NBC)
